resources.string: 4. Regarding sleep disorders in schizophrenia? (NOTE: checking wrong answers will attract negative marks)
Difficulty sleeping usually occurs weeks to months before onset of florid symptoms of schizophrenia
There is usually intermittent awakening and problems of sleep maintenance
There is usually early morning wakening
There is usually difficulty in sleep initiation
3. The word that qualifies a situation in which someone hears voices of unseen people in clear consciousness is called?
1.Changing the pattern of thinking (cognitive psychotherapy) is useful in the treatment of all forms of depression?
2.Most phobias and other anxiety disorders in children are usually outgrown as they develop into adulthood?
